name: Computer Science
careers: Software Engineer, Data Analyst, Cybersecurity Specialist, Web Developer

name: Mechanical Engineering
careers: Robotics Engineer, HVAC Engineer, Automotive Engineer, Aerospace Engineer

name: Art
careers: Graphic Designer, Art Curator, Multimedia Artist, Art Therapist, Animator

name: Economics
careers: Economist (often with graduate degree), Financial Analyst, Data Scientist, Actuary, Market Research Analyst

name: Mathematics
careers: High School Teacher, Cryptographer, Quantitative Analyst (Quant), Data Scientist, Statistician

name: Biology
careers: Medical Scientist, Biotechnologist, Pharmaceutical Sales Rep, Environmental Consultant, Veterinarian

name: History
careers: Archivist, Museum Curator, Lawyer (requires JD), Policy Analyst, Secondary Education Teacher
